path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Yieldly Marketplace Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Transaction-Ordering Dependence
findings.description: This finding indicates a vulnerability where the outcome of a transaction depends on the order in which it is executed.

findings.title: Unsafe Memory Handling
findings.description: The finding indicates potential issues with memory handling in the smart contract, which can lead to unexpected behavior or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Unsafe Random Number Generator
findings.description: The report highlights the usage of an unsafe random number generator which can lead to unpredictable and insecure behavior.

findings.title: Round-off in fee calculations
findings.description: Fee calculations performed by divide-and-then-multiple will result in rounding off in the amount that royalty, platform and creator receive.
